Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the music of 'X-Men: First Class' (2011)?
Options:
A. A) Henry Jackman composed the incidental music for the film.
B. B) Vaughn directed 'X-Men: First Class'.
C. C) Henry Jackman previously collaborated with Vaughn in 'Kick-Ass' (2010).
D. D) The music for 'X-Men: First Class' was purely orchestral.
Correct Answer: A) Henry Jackman composed the incidental music for the film., C) Henry Jackman previously collaborated with Vaughn in 'Kick-Ass' (2010).
